hero_subtitle: Master's Student in Computer Science at USP
project1_title: Weaving Lines of Integral Health Care in the Amazon
project1_desc: I work on developing apps, APIs, and AI solutions for residents of the Lower Amazon and Tapajós regions. The goal is to strengthen Primary Health Care (APS) using digital and social technologies to reduce inequalities. The project is coordinated by Prof. Aylene Bousquat (USP) and funded by
profile_collab_bubble:
Do you want to collaborate?
Send me an email!
profile_p1: I am a Master's student at the University of São Paulo (USP), funded by BNDES and advised by Prof. João Neto. My research focuses on AI, with an emphasis on policy evaluation and machine learning.
profile_p2: I was a research assistant at Imperial College London, supervised by Gabriel Ramos, and also at FEA/USP with Gilmar Masiero. I have a background in International Relations from ESPM-SP and Chemical Engineering from USP. Currently, I am an AI Engineer at Asibras, and was previously the CEO of SMTech.
profile_p3: When I'm not researching, I'm an avid reader and enjoy practicing sports, including boxing and chess.
profile_contact_p: Feel free to email me for any questions or collaboration opportunities: alison.sousa@usp.br.
research_paper1_title: Expanding the OLI and LLL Approaches: The ERP Chinese Model
research_paper1_authors: Alison Sousa, Gilmar Masiero, Mario Ogasavara, Valmor Comim
research_paper4_title: AI for Epidemiological Risk Prediction in Brazil
research_paper2_title: AI for Epidemiological Risk Prediction in Brazil: A SLR
research_paper3_title: International diversification via ETFs from the Sharpe ratio perspective
research_paper3_venue: 33rd National Meeting of Administration Graduation Courses, 2022
teaching_course1_p: Monitored undergraduate classes in NLP. Assisted with grading Python projects, introducing techniques and models applied to human language.
teaching_course2_p: Supported interns with professional integration and project development, including assistance in grading their final papers on the topic.
teaching_course3_p: Contributed to grading, developing data analysis, and creating development indicators to support studies in Economics.
vitae_p1: Please download my full Curriculum Vitae (CV) for a detailed overview of my academic background, professional experience, and publications.
about_p1: I enjoy activities that stimulate strategic thinking and personal development. I'm an enthusiast of the game Go, which enhances my anticipation skills. I practice boxing as it's a sport that teaches patience and acting with precision under pressure. As a Brazilian passionate about sports, I follow European football, especially FC Barcelona. Here I share a bit more about my interests. Click any image to expand.
gallery_go_desc: Do you like Go? I'm an avid player! It's a great exercise in strategy and patience.
gallery_team_desc: Teamwork is fundamental. Here, a moment of relaxation with project colleagues.
gallery_boxing_desc: Boxing teaches me a lot about discipline and focus. One of my passions.
gallery_drawing_desc: I didn't draw this lol, but I loved this portrait I received! What do you think?
gallery_espm_desc: Good times at ESPM, where I graduated in International Relations.
gallery_formal_desc: A more formal photo with another group of colleagues. Collaboration is key.
gallery_campnou_desc: As a huge FC Barcelona fan, being at Camp Nou was an unforgettable experience. What about you, which team do you support?
gallery_playstation_desc: Life isn't just about work and study, right? A moment as a PlayStation fan.
